import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import Creative5 from '../asset/c5.webp'; const LandingPage = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ firstName: '', lastName: '', email: '', industry: '', }); const handleChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value, }); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Add your form submission logic here console.log('Form submitted:', formData); }; const { firstName, lastName, email, industry } = formData; return (
